Furuncle and carbuncle 
Furuncles require oral 
antibiotics. The 
following can be used:  
Amoxicillin 500mg TDS 
(25-50 mg/kg/day)  
• Cloxacillin 500mg QID 
(50mg/kg/day)  
• Cephalexin 250-
500mg QID (25–50 
mg/kg/day) 
 • Amoxicillin-
clavulanate 
combination: 625mg 
TDS 
Carbuncles require 
surgical drainage in 
addition to oral 
antibiotics; duration of 
antibiotics is 5 to 7 days 
based on clinical 
response. 
For severe infection in 
sick patients, carbuncle 
would require 
parenteral antibiotic, 
treatment as follows: 
Inj Cefuroxime 1.5 g 
q8h 
Inj Amoxicillin-
clavulanate 1.2g TDS   
Alternatively - Inj 
Clindamycin 600-900mg 
TDS
